name: The Quest of the Hourglass
description:
WASD to move

Mouse to aim the sword.

Bump the enemies with your weapon to damage them.

Gameplay and Game design by :

Maxime Charland

and

Alexis Maher

Art :

The majority of the assets were made by our amazing friend : Ronan Le Gall

https://www.ronanlegall.com/

Music :

Deep Forest by David Vitas
